Rich Outcomes

Go beyond price feeds. Verify complex events like sports results, news accuracy, and AI inferences with structured JSON data.

DePIN Powered

A decentralized network of light nodes (Sentinels) ensures truth is verified by consensus, not centralized authorities.

Helios Native

Leveraging Chronos for automated settlement and Hyperion for cross-chain data access without bridges.
